title: Teapot And Cover
creditline: Gift of the C. Helme and Alice B. Strater Collection
description: White glass with slight blue cast.  Painted decoration with Chinoiserie style.  Woman with parasol central figure on either side of teapot.  Teapot has old repairs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Teapot And Cover.
glass. Gift of the C. Helme and Alice B. Strater Collection. 1976-1-82-a,b.
